chunk:
Ao Skincare Peak Strength AM Serum-Shot

Brand: Ao Skincare

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Panthenol, Ethoxydiglycol, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Artemisia Vulgaris (Mugwort) Extract, Laminaria Digitata (Algae) Extract, Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), Sodi

e (Vitamin B3), Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Ferulic Acid, Mel (Manuka Honey), Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Narcissus Tazetta Bulb Extract, Acetyl Octapeptide-3, Copper tripeptide-1/Bis (tripeptide-1) Copper Acetate, Phenyl t-Butylnitrone, Crithmum Maritimum (Sea Fennel) Extract, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-37, Caprylyl Glycol, Xanthan G

yl Glycol, Xanthan Gum, Sodium Phytate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol

Directions: Apply 1 pump of the serum to the face day and night before day and night treatments.

Warnings: Avoid contact with eyes, if irritation occurs discontinue use and please let us know: [email protected] . This product is not inte
product is not intended to diagnose, treat, mitigate, cure or prevent any disease(s).
